com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.renderer

Interface IRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBatchRenderer, ICharRenderer, IConsoleOverlayRenderer, IDebugRenderer, IDialogRenderer, IEntityRenderer, IImageRenderer, IMapRenderer, IMultiRenderer, IObjectRenderer, IPlayerRenderer, IShapeRenderer, ISingleRenderer, ITextRenderer

    public interface IRenderer
extends IRenderContext
    A parent for types that render content.
